sentence.Network_en: Japan is in the enviable position of having a budget surplus.
sentence.Network_cn: 日本的预算盈余令人羡慕。

sentence.Network_en: This conservatory enjoys an enviable position overlooking a leafy expanse.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个温室位置绝佳，放眼望去，草木繁茂，郁郁葱葱。

sentence.Network_en: Britain has an enviable record on breast screening for cancer.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国妇女的乳腺癌患病率很低，着实令人羡慕。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这样记单词真的很有效_英语吧_百度贴吧 ... enthusiastic 狂热的. enviable 令人羡慕的. enteric 肠的.
欧洲人眼里的欧洲人-英语点津 ... 15. powerhouse: 强国。 19. enviable: 值得羡慕的。 23. antagonism: 敌意，对立。.
妒忌-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 妒忌的 envious 引起妒忌的 enviable 没有妒忌就没有爱情。 Love is never without jealousy.
Your white skin is really enviable !, 你白润的皮肤真让人羡慕.

list.abs: 什么意思_英语enviable在线翻译... ... Your perfect enviable 你完美的让人羡慕 An enviable 令人羡慕 Less Enviable 值得羡慕.

over the past decades , Hong Kong has achieved , in every respect , most enviable success . at US $ 25 , 000 , our GDP per capita is the second highest in Asia .过去数十年，香港在各方面都取得十分骄人的成就：香港按人口平均计算的本地生产总值为２５，０００美元，在亚洲名列第二；
synthetic vitamins have established an enviable record in purity of product .合成维生素在产品纯度方面已证实具有出色的记录。
compared with its peers , Exxon is certainly in enviable position .与同行相比，埃克森无疑处于令人羡慕的位置。

means.word_mean: 引起妒忌的,值得羡慕的

entry.tran: 令人羡慕的;引人妒嫉的
entry.def: You describe something such as a quality as enviable when someone else has it and you wish that you had it too.

example.ex: Japan is in the enviable position of having a budget surplus...
example.tran: 日本的预算盈余令人羡慕。

example.ex: They have enviable reputations as athletes.
example.tran: 作为运动员，他们的声望令人羡慕。

auth_sentence.content: Sales are booming on the back of enviable brand awareness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sales are booming on the back of enviable brand awareness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sales are booming on the back of enviable brand awareness.

auth_sentence.content: Hodgson does not have an enviable cast to choose from.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hodgson does not have an enviable cast to choose from.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hodgson does not have an enviable cast to choose from.

auth_sentence.content: Not that life in the old Rumford was entirely enviable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not that life in the old Rumford was entirely enviable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not that life in the old Rumford was entirely enviable.

means.word_mean: (指人或物)引起嫉妒的,值得羡慕的

sentences.en: She has built up an enviable reputation as a harpist.
sentences.cn: 她已经成为一名颇有名望的竖琴演奏家。

sentences.en: You are in a position that many would consider enviable.
sentences.cn: 你处在一个很多人会认为值得羡慕的地位。
